com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers

Class DataWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers.BasicWrapper
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers.DataWatcher

  • public class DataWatcher
extends BasicWrapper
    This class is a wrapper of the DataWatcher class from CraftBukkit
    It is used to store data and to keep track of changes so they can be synchronized

      • DataWatcher

        public DataWatcher()
        Initializes a new Empty DataWatcher. Please avoid binding this constructed DataWatcher to live entities. When doing so, instead use the Entity-accepting constructor.

      • isChanged

        public boolean isChanged()
        Gets whether this Data Watcher has changed since the last tick
        Returns:
        True if it had changed, False if not

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Gets whether this Data Watcher is empty or not. An empty Data Watcher does not require any update messages to the players.
        Returns:
        True if empty, False if not
